name: Audio Mixer
description: Get mixing guide for dialogue, music, and SFX
author: raymAIzing film

steps.prompt:
Create audio mix guide:

DIALOGUE: {{dialogueLevel}}
MUSIC: {{musicLevel}}
SFX: {{sfxLevel}}
AMBIENT: {{ambientLevel}}
MIX STYLE: {{mixStyle}}

SCENE: {{sceneDescription}}

Provide:

## LEVEL SETTINGS (dB)
| Track | Base Level | Peak Level |
|-------|------------|------------|
| Dialogue | -12dB | -6dB |
| Music | -18dB | -12dB |
| SFX | -15dB | -6dB |
| Ambient | -24dB | -18dB |

## LEVEL AUTOMATION
Timeline of level changes:
- 0:00-0:05: [Levels and reason]
- 0:05-0:15: [Levels and reason]
[Continue]

## EQ SUGGESTIONS
### Dialogue
- High-pass: [Hz]
- Presence boost: [Hz, dB]
- De-ess: [Hz]

### Music
- Low cut: [Hz]
- Duck under dialogue: [dB]

### SFX
- Frequency range: [Hz-Hz]
- Compression: [Ratio]

## COMPRESSION SETTINGS
| Track | Ratio | Attack | Release | Threshold |
|-------|-------|--------|---------|----------|
| Dialogue | 3:1 | 10ms | 100ms | -18dB |
[Continue]

## SPATIAL POSITIONING
- Dialogue: [Center/L/R]
- Music: [Stereo width]
- SFX: [Positioning]
- Ambient: [Surround]

## TRANSITION POINTS
- Crossfade locations
- Volume automation curves

## FINAL MIX TARGETS
- Integrated loudness: -14 LUFS
- True peak: -1dB
- Dynamic range: [LU]
